title: Spotify User Authentication and Home Page Access Test
description: Verify that users can successfully create a Spotify account, log in, and access the home page. The test should confirm that all UI elements are properly displayed and functional across different browsers and devices.
preConditions: Spotify application is accessible via web browser or desktop app.
User has a valid email address for registration.

steps.expectedResult: The login page loads successfully with all form fields visible.

steps.action: Enter valid credentials and submit the form.
steps.expectedResult: The system accepts the credentials and logs the user in.

steps.action: Verify that the user is redirected to the home page.
steps.expectedResult: Home page loads successfully with recommended playlists and recent items visible.

steps.action: Verify that all UI elements on the home page are properly displayed.
steps.expectedResult: All UI elements are visible, properly aligned, and functional.
